channel.title: [PI] 562; How do I fix skill reqs for gear?

item.title: [PI] 562; How do I fix skill reqs for gear?
item.dc:creator: @talontantalize talontantalize
item.description:
@talontantalize wrote:

Edit: okay so I found where to set skill reqs for equipment but now I have a new issue setting a req doesn’t work for all the gear

for example:

if (itemName.contains("black d'hide")) { c.rangeLevelReq = 70; } if (itemName.contains("tzhaar-ket-om")) { c.strengthLevelReq = 60; }
Here we have Black d’hide armor set and working properly. Then the obsidian maul, set up relatively the same, yet it can still be wielded by anyone of any strength level anyone know how to fix this?

Read full topic
item.source: [PI] 562; How do I fix skill reqs for gear?
